function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffective prohibition of intercity travel","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate response to outbreak in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid dispersal of covid-19 from wuhan due to travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strong correlation between number of cases and travelers from wuhan","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delayed arrival of covid-19 in other cities due to travel ban","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of travel restrictions and social distancing measures in preventing the spread of infection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission patterns and the impact of interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive data on covid-19 epidemiology, human movement, and public health interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of the sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale travel movements during the spring festival holiday","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of vaccine or specific drug treatment for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from wild animals to humans","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of zoonotic disease transmission through wildlife conservation activities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Movement of researchers from higher income countries to developing countries","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring and intervention activities during perturbations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 from local communities to endangered great ape populations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Declines in food security, trade, and tourism leading to reduction in incentives to conserve local biodiversity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Boosting of tourism revenues leading to negative impacts on biodiversity conservation and wider sustainability goals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enhanced public interest in sustainability and community action","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Opportunities for health and well-being in nature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"One health approach in guinea-bissau and indonesia","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global travel restrictions leading to decreased tourism and economic impact on conservation sites","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased focus on local conservation leading to overcrowding and environmental degradation at local sites","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Renewed interest in national parks and conservation leading to overexploitation and disturbance of natural ecosystems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced local capacity due to travel and work restrictions and lost training opportunities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loss of partnerships","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interspecies transmission and pandemic risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 restrictions on human movement and trade on habitats, with quantifiable data lacking","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deterioration of stability leading to an increase in violence, illegal hunting, and illicit trade due to acute perturbations such as war or strife","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-related collapse of the international cashew market leading to food insecurity for farmers working in the cantanhez national park","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recognizing trade-offs in conservation research agendas due to reduced future spending and accelerating climate and biodiversity crises","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Understanding human-nature interactions, including inter-species disease transmission pathways, and changes in motivations for seeking interactions with nature due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Zoonotic disease outbreaks including covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale engineering projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sudden economic or political change","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through wildlife and the environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of zoonotic disease spillover due to perturbations in wildlife and ecology","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential impact of conservation activities perturbation on disease vectors and transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on biodiversity conservation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interconnectedness of all things leading to spread of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in social and economic models for conservation activities due to pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resumption of funding to pre-pandemic levels cannot be guaranteed due to global financial downturns","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rushed government measures or societal backlash may harm conservation efforts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Biodiversity changes associated with global human confinement and pandemic-related societal and behavioral changes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline in tourism revenue and disrupted trade routes leading to economic losses, poverty, and resource use","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consequences of declines in tourism and trade resulting from covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in conservation monitoring and enforcement capacity due to restricted movements and postponed funding","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of inter-species transmission of contagious diseases in the cantanhez national park due to proximity between wildlife and humans","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced presence of international researchers leading to a potential lack of expertise and knowledge in conservation and wildlife management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential economic impact on tourism-dependent economies like the seychelles due to reduced tourism activity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
